title: President Donald J. Trump Protects America Through Lawful Detention of Terrorists – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
January 30, 2018
When it comes to terrorism, we will do whatever is necessary to protect our nation.
						President Donald J. Trump					KEEPING AMERICA SAFE: President Trump is fulfilling his commitment to use all available tools to defeat terrorism and protect the United States homeland and its interests abroad.KEEPING AMERICA PREPARED: President Trump understands the threats that still face the U.S. and pose a threat to its citizens.KEEPING THE THREAT AT BAY: The President’s new action is vital to preserving the tools and capabilities necessary to end the terror threat.
